mapper.select:
select station_name, case data_source_id when 1 then 'ARSSite' when 2 then 'NWISSite' when 3 then 'STORETSite' else 'Unknown' end style_url, organization_name, organization, site_id, station_name station_name2, station_type_name, description_text, huc_8, contrib_drain_area_value, contrib_drain_area_unit, aqfr_type_name, aqfr_name, well_depth_value, well_depth_unit, to_char(s.geom.sdo_point.x, 'FM990.0000000') || ',' || to_char(s.geom.sdo_point.y, 'FM90.0000000') coordinates
order by station_id

select data_source, count(distinct s.site_id) station_count
group by rollup(data_source)
